Delicious!  I was thrilled to see that home potatoes were on the menu with all of the savory brunch items.  Being from the USA, I miss home fries.  I didn't have such a big appetite today, so I opted for something lighter than what my eyes wanted me to order.  Next time I go I'm definitely trying the triple whammy burger, and maybe a side order of pancakes.  So much to choose from, and it all looks delicious!
